metadata.title: CVE-2016-6810 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Apache ActiveMQ 5.x before 5.14.2, an instance of a cross-site scripting vulnerability was identified to be present in the web based administration console. The root cause of this issue is improper user data output validation.

criterions.comment: activemq package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.14.2+dfsg-1').
